Title: Can the way pigs are handled alter behavioural and physiological measures of affective state?

Reasoning for "Age":
- The paper mentions that the pigs were 9 weeks old when they were transported to the experimental facilities and 27 weeks old when they were transported to the slaughterhouse.
- The treatments started when the pigs were 19 weeks old and lasted until they were 27 weeks old.
- The age range of the pigs during the experiment was from 9 to 27 weeks.

- Since the pigs were used in the experiment from 9 to 27 weeks of age, they were not sexually mature or close to sexual maturity at the start of the experiment and were still considered juvenile.
